source_sentence: 佛說光明童子因緣經卷第二
translation: Foshuo guangming dongzi yinnian jing roll 2

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大
translation: Tripiṭaka Pilgrimage to the Western Paradise Translation Sutra

source_sentence: 夫試光祿卿傳法大師
translation: Fuzi guangluqing zhuanfa dashi

source_sentence: 賜紫臣施護奉詔　譯
translation: Imperial Decree granting the Purple Minister Shi Hao Translation

source_sentence: 爾時王舍城中，有二童子：一姓婆羅門；一姓剎帝利，其剎帝利童子，名曰壽命。
translation: It was then that there were two boys in the city of Rājagṛha: one surnamed Brāhmaṇa and the other surnamed Śārdila, whose name was Śārdila the Boy of Life.

source_sentence: 是二童子，從王舍城出，於其路左，共為戲劇。
translation: These two boys left Rājagṛha and shared a drama on the left side of the road.

source_sentence: 彼壽命童子，久發正信；婆羅門童子，不具正信，乃謂壽命童子言：「我聞世尊先說：『善賢長者妻當生子，其後生已，家族富盛，最上吉祥，現於人中受天勝福，乃至最後，於我法中出家學道，斷諸煩惱，證阿羅漢。』
translation: That boy Life had long developed right faith, but the boy Brāhmaṇa, who didn't have right faith, said to the boy Life, "I heard the Bhagavān first say, 'The wife of that good man will give birth to a son, and when he subsequently gives birth, his family will be prosperous and most auspicious, and he'll receive excellent fortune among men and gods now, and finally, he'll leave home and train on the path in my teaching, end the afflictions, and realize the arhatship.'

source_sentence: 彼善賢妻，已趣命終，子必隨滅，長者親屬，送置尸陀林中。
translation: When that good wife's life ends, her children will surely perish with her, and the elders' relatives will send her away to the cemetery.

source_sentence: 我知是事，豈非世尊說妄語邪？」
translation: I know this, but isn't it because the Bhagavān told a lie?"

source_sentence: 時壽命童子，即為婆羅門童子，說伽陀曰：「日月星宿可墜地，　　山石從地可飛空，　海水淵深可令枯，　　佛語決定無虛妄。」
translation: The Boy Life then spoke to the Brāhmaṇa boy about the jātaka, saying, "The sun, moon, stars, and constellations may fall to the ground, mountains and rocks may fly out of the ground, and the depth of the ocean may dry up, but the Buddha's words are certainly not false."

source_sentence: 是時，婆羅門童子聞是伽陀已，謂壽命童子言：「汝或不信，我今同汝，往尸陀林，審觀是事。」
translation: After the Brāhmaṇa boy heard this kārtta, he said to the Boy Life, "If you don't believe it, I will go with you now to the cemetery to examine this matter."

source_sentence: 于是，世尊從王舍城，次第而行。
translation: The Bhagavān then left Rājagṛha and went in order.

source_sentence: 彼二童子，猶在路左，共為戲劇。
translation: Those two boys were still on the left side of the road, working together as a troupe.

source_sentence: 時壽命童子，遙見世尊大眾圍繞，以宿善根故，即說伽陀曰：「希有大牟尼，　　離諸動亂相，　人天大眾俱，　　次第而圍繞；　以師子吼音，　　能破諸外論，　善斷眾疑網，　　最上難得見。
translation: Seeing the Bhagavān surrounded by a large crowd, the Boy of Life, because of his long-standing good roots, said to them, "Rarely does a great muni part with all his turbulent features, surrounded by a great multitude of people and gods in order, roar with the voice of a lion, refute external theories, skillfully cut off the web of doubt, and become the most difficult to see.

source_sentence: 佛往尸陀林，　　威儀相可觀，　如風飄密雪，　　清冷而遍空。
translation: The Buddha goes to the cemetery, his comportment is observable, like the wind blowing dense snow, cool and pervasive as space.

source_sentence: 釋迦牟尼尊！
translation: Venerable Śākyamuni!

source_sentence: 現光明變化，　剎那瞻覩者，　　隨應獲利益。」
translation: The manifestation of a radiant transformation is followed by benefits for those who momentarily behold it."

source_sentence: 爾時，摩伽陀國主頻婆娑羅王，聞「佛世尊先說：『善賢長者妻當生子，其後生已，家族富盛，最上吉祥，現於人中受天勝福，乃至最後，於我法中出家學道，斷諸煩惱，證阿羅漢。』
translation: It was then that King Bimbisāra, lord of Magadha, heard, "The Bhagavān first said, 'Good man, your wife will give birth to a son, and when he is subsequently born, his family will be prosperous and most auspicious, and he'll receive excellent fortune among humans and, finally, leave home and train on the path in our teaching, end the afflictions, and realize the arhatship.'

source_sentence: 彼妻已趣命終，長者親屬，送尸陀林。
translation: After his wife's life ended, the elder's relatives sent her away to the cemetery.

source_sentence: 今佛世尊，與諸大眾圍繞，亦詣尸陀林中。」
translation: Now, the Bhagavān, surrounded by the great assembly, has also gone to the cemetery."

source_sentence: 王聞是已，即自思惟：「我佛世尊，若無義利，而輒不往彼尸陀林，將非善賢之妻死而復生，世尊往彼欲為施作諸利益故？
translation: After the king heard this, he thought to himself, "Bhagavān, if we didn't go to that cemetery so easily without any benefit, wouldn't a good wife die and be reborn again, and would the Bhagavān want to go there to work for the benefit of others?

source_sentence: 我今宜應往觀是事。」
translation: Now, it would be appropriate for me to go and observe this."

source_sentence: 是時，頻婆娑羅王作是思惟已，即與耆舊、大臣、宮嬪、官屬圍繞而出。
translation: After he had thought this, King Bimbisāra went out with his elders, ministers, ladies of the palace, and officials around him.

source_sentence: 王出城時，彼二童子，尚居路左，共為戲劇。
translation: When the king left the city, those two boys were still on the left side of the road, working together as a troupe.

source_sentence: 彼壽命童子遙見頻婆娑羅王已，即時前詣，說伽陀曰：「最勝摩伽陀國主，　　臣佐圍繞出王城，　發起決定淨信心，　　一切人眾皆歡喜。」
translation: After they saw King Bimbisāra from a distance, the boy with long life immediately approached him and said to him, "The most excellent lord of Magadha, surrounded by ministers and assistants, has left the king's city, arisen a resolute and pure faith, and all people are delighted."

source_sentence: 是時，佛及一切人天大眾、頻婆娑羅王，乃至壽命童子等，咸悉至於尸陀林中。
translation: At that point, the Buddha, all the great multitudes of humans and gods, King Bimbisāra, and the Life Boy all went to the cemetery.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊，即從口中，放淨光明，普照眾會。
translation: The Bhagavān then let out a pure radiance from his mouth that shone universally in the congregation.

source_sentence: 時彼先占相者，外道尼乾陀等，亦在會中，覩佛世尊放光明已，即作是念：「今此沙門瞿曇，於大眾中，現光明相，豈非善賢之子不命終邪？」
translation: Those laymen Nirgrantha and others who had previously divined the fortune were also present in the assembly, and when they saw the Bhagavān shine that bright light, they thought, "Now, isn't this ascetic Gautama, who's shown a bright face in the midst of the masses, the son of a good man who won't die?"

source_sentence: 作是念已，謂長者言：「長者！
translation: After this thought, he said to the elder, "Sir!

source_sentence: 我觀沙門瞿曇現光明相，必是汝子存而不歿？」
translation: When I observe the ascetic Gautama in his radiant form, surely your son survives and isn't perishing?"

source_sentence: 善賢長者白言：「我師聖者！
translation: The eldest of the Śubhajas said, "My teacher, the sage!

source_sentence: 此事若然，我當云何？」
translation: If this is so, what will become of me?"

source_sentence: 外道告言：「長者！
translation: The non-Buddhists told them, "Sir!

source_sentence: 汝子若存，當令入我法中普遍修學。」
translation: If your son survives, you will allow him to enter my teaching and train universally."

source_sentence: 爾時，長者將焚其妻，先已積薪，并所用物，置尸於中，舉火以焚，火焰既發，即從臍間，漸次破裂，中出蓮華。
translation: When the elder was about to burn his wife, he had gathered firewood and the things he used to put the body in the fire, and when the fire started, it broke open gradually from his navel and a lotus flower emerged from it.

source_sentence: 於其華中，有一童子，端然而坐，面貌端正，色相殊異。
translation: In one of those flowers, there was a boy sitting upright with a correct countenance and a different appearance.

source_sentence: 是時會中無數大眾，悉覩是相，歎未曾有，諸正信者，憶佛前言誠無虛妄。
translation: Countless multitudes of people at that time saw this image and admired it as unprecedented, and those of correct faith recalled that the Buddha's words before him were truly not false.

source_sentence: 時彼外道尼乾陀，觀是事已，心生苦惱，斂然而住。
translation: After observing this, that non-Buddhist Nirgrantha became distressed and withdrew his seat.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即告善賢長者言：「長者！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed that good elder, saying, "Sir!

source_sentence: 汝今收此童子，護持養育。」
translation: Now, you must take this boy and nurture him."

source_sentence: 時外道尼乾陀，竊觀長者面相已，謂言：「長者！
translation: After secretly observing the elder's face, the heretic Nirgrantha said, "Sir!

source_sentence: 焚尸火中，忽出童子，於一切事，皆不吉祥，汝今不應收歸養育。」
translation: A child suddenly emerging from a burning corpse's fire is inauspicious in every way, so you shouldn't take it in now."

source_sentence: 時善賢長者，即不肯受。
translation: That's when the good elder refused to accept it.

source_sentence: 是時，佛告壽命童子言：「汝宜收此童子護持養育。」
translation: The Buddha then addressed the Boy of Life, saying, "It's appropriate for you to take this child and nurture him."

source_sentence: 時壽命童子，先審思已，後白佛言：「於我舍中，無處容受，設得此子，非我所宜。」
translation: After examining it, the Boy of Life then said to the Buddha, "There's nowhere in my house that I can accept this child, and it wouldn't be appropriate for me to obtain him."

source_sentence: 時善賢妻焚燒已竟，以佛光明威神力故，火自息滅。
translation: After his wife had been burned, the fire went out because of the Buddha's radiant power.

source_sentence: 於剎那間，天降細雪，自然清冷，收置餘薪，淨其焚地。
translation: In a moment, fine snow fell from the sky, which was naturally cool, and the remaining firewood was put away to purify the burning place.

source_sentence: 是時，火中出者童子安然而住。
translation: The boy who emerged from the fire then stayed put.

source_sentence: 于是，世尊普告壽命童子等言：「汝等有正信者，勿學外道邪異誑亂，當住正念。」
translation: The Bhagavān then addressed the Boy Life, saying, "All of you with right faith should not follow the false and divergent teachings of non-Buddhists and confuse them; you must abide in right mindfulness."

source_sentence: 壽命童子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: The Boy Life span said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我於王族生，亦於王族老，我身清淨，猶如牛頭妙栴檀香，等無有異，我實不知外道邪異誑亂等事。」
translation: I was born into the king's family and grew old into the king's family, and my body is pure, just like the fragrance of the oxhead's wonderful sandalwood, and there's nothing different about it. I really don't know anything that's wrong or divergent and that's causing confusion among non-Buddhists."

source_sentence: 是時，世尊又復告彼善賢長者言：「今此童子是汝之子，汝可收歸護持養育。」
translation: The Bhagavān then again addressed that good elder, saying, "Now, this boy is your son, so you can take him in and nurture him."

source_sentence: 彼善賢長者，邪見堅固，不行正道，即時又復竊觀外道尼乾陀面。
translation: That elder of Good Samaritan's wrong view was so strong that he didn't follow the right path, and then he secretly observed the face of the outsider Nirgrantha again.

source_sentence: 彼外道言：「善賢長者！
translation: The heretic said, "Good sir!

source_sentence: 汝宜審思，今此童子，火中遺殘，大不吉祥，雖火不燒，而相豈善？
translation: Consider this child left behind in the fire, how inauspicious it is, even though the fire doesn't burn him, and how good he looks.

source_sentence: 汝若收歸，決定令汝家族破壞，又復於汝命不相益，及於汝身為多損惱，凡所欲事，不得和合。
translation: If you take it back, it will surely destroy your family, cause no benefit to your life, cause much harm to your body, and prevent the reconciliation of whatever you want.

source_sentence: 深自籌量，無宜後悔。」
translation: Consider it carefully; there's no reason to regret it."

source_sentence: 長者聞外道言已，復不肯受。
translation: After hearing the heretic's words, the elder refused to accept them.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即謂頻婆娑羅王言：「大王！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed King Bimbisāra, saying, "Great king!

source_sentence: 汝今收此童子，王宮養育。」
translation: Now, you must take this boy and raise him in the king's palace."

source_sentence: 時頻婆娑羅王受佛教勅，即速起身曲躬伸手取其童子，普遍觀瞻已，即白佛言：「我依佛勅，收歸王宮。
translation: Upon receiving the Buddha's command, King Bimbisāra quickly got up, bent his body, stretched out his hand, took the boy, and looked at him universally before saying to the Buddha, "I did as the Buddha commanded, and I took him back to the palace.

source_sentence: 然此童子，作何名字？
translation: What then is the name of this child?

source_sentence: 願佛世尊，善為安立。」
translation: May the Buddha, the Bhagavān, establish it well."

source_sentence: 佛言：「大王！
translation: The Buddha said, "Great king!

source_sentence: 今此童子從火中得，應為立名號火光明。」
translation: Now, this boy has been caught in the fire, so he should be given the name Firelight Illumination."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊於大眾中，以此童子，付授頻婆娑羅王已。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān presented this boy to King Bimbisāra in the midst of the crowd.

source_sentence: 即時觀察審知頻婆娑羅王，及諸會眾，若體若性，心所樂欲，如其所應，廣為說法。
translation: He immediately observed and examined King Bimbisāra and the congregation, knowing their essence and nature and the desires of their minds, and taught them the Dharma as they should be taught.

source_sentence: 是諸會眾，得聞法已，中有多百人，發起最上清淨正信，有證須陀洹果者、有證斯陀含果者、有證阿那含果者、有證阿羅漢果者、有能進發煖位善根者、有能進發頂位善根者、有能進發忍位善根者、有發聲聞菩提心者、有發緣覺菩提心者、有發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心者、有發歸依攝受心者、有於學句起攝受心者。
translation: After these congregations heard the teaching, many hundreds of them aroused the highest pure correct faith, some realizing the fruit of stream entry, some realizing the fruit of once-returning, some realizing the fruit of non-returning, some realizing the fruit of the arhat, some capable of furthering the wholesome roots of the stage of warmth, some capable of furthering the wholesome roots of the stage of heading, some capable of furthering the wholesome roots of the stage of patience, some arousing the mind of śrāvaka bodhisattva, some arousing the mind of pratyekabuddha bodhisattva, some arousing the mind of unsurpassed, three contemplations of bodhi, some arousing the mind of taking refuge in the Buddha, and some arousing the mind of taking refuge in the phrases of training.

source_sentence: 如是會眾，以佛功德及正法力，眾和合事，隨其所應，咸得利益。
translation: Thus, with the merits of the Buddha and the power of the right Dharma, the congregation was able to combine their efforts and obtain benefits as they saw fit.

source_sentence: 爾時頻婆娑羅王，即離佛會，將此童子，還復王宮。
translation: It was then that King Bimbisāra left the Buddha's assembly and returned the boy to the king's palace.

source_sentence: 是時大王召八宮嬪，以為八母；二為養母，使令恩養；二為乳母，使令乳哺；二為淨母，使令灌浣；二為戲母，使令伴習戲翫。
translation: The king then summoned eight ladies of the palace to be his eight mothers, two to be nurturing mothers who would nurture him, two to be nursing mothers who would nurse him, two to be purifying mothers who would wash him, and two to be play mothers who would play and play with him.

source_sentence: 如是王勅八母，付其童子，自乳哺中，至於成長，或乳或食，及餘所須。
translation: Thus, the king commands eight mothers to entrust their children with the task of nursing them from the time they're suckled until they're grown up, whether it's for milk or food or whatever else is necessary.

source_sentence: 於晝夜中，撫憐恩育，無令闕失。
translation: Throughout the day and night, he'll nurture them with kindness and compassion, making sure nothing is missing.

source_sentence: 後漸長成，如清淨池一蓮秀出，愛護存惜，其義亦然。
translation: Later, as he gradually grows into maturity, he'll be like a single lotus emerging from a pure pond that's loved, protected, and cherished, which is the same thing.

source_sentence: 乃至後時，光明童子，有一舅氏，久持財物，出外商販，漸歷歲年，未由還復。
translation: It wasn't until much later, when the Boy of Light had an uncle who had long held possessions and sold them abroad for years and years, but he had no way to return.

source_sentence: 忽於一時，外聞人說：「我妹懷妊，佛為記說：『定當生男，其後生已，家族富盛，最上吉祥，現於人中受天勝福，乃至最後，於我法中出家學道，斷諸煩惱，證阿羅漢。』」
translation: Suddenly, there was a time when someone from outside the community heard him say, "My sister is pregnant, and the Buddha has recorded for her, 'A son will surely be born, and when he is subsequently born, his family will be prosperous and most fortunate, and he'll receive excellent fortune among humans and, finally, leave home and train on the path in my teaching, cut off the afflictions, and realize the arhatship.'"

source_sentence: 時彼舅氏，聞此語已，即速聚收商販財物，涉遠齎持，還歸自舍。
translation: After hearing these words, that uncle quickly gathered the merchant's property, carried it a long way, and returned it to her house.

source_sentence: 既至舍中，知妹已歿，悲號啼泣，審自思惟：「外先所聞佛記我妹定當生男，乃至斷諸煩惱，證阿羅漢。
translation: When he arrived at the house, he knew his sister had died, lamented and wept, and thought to himself, "I heard earlier that the Buddha had predicted that my sister would surely give birth to a son and that she would end the afflictions and realize arhatship.

source_sentence: 今妹既歿，佛虛設言，豈佛世尊亦妄說邪？」
translation: Now that my sister is dead, did the Buddha make a false claim, or did the Bhagavān also say that falsely?"

source_sentence: 作是念已，即往隣家，詢問其故，謂隣人言：「我出外方商販始還，先聞人說，我妹懷妊，佛為記言：『定當生男，其後生已，家族富盛，最上吉祥，現於人中受天勝福，乃至最後，於我法中出家學道，斷諸煩惱，證阿羅漢。』
translation: After he thought this, he went to his neighbor's house and asked about the reason. He said to the neighbor, "I had been away on a trader's trip and had just returned when I heard someone say that my sister was expecting a baby and that the Buddha had recorded for me, 'A son will surely be born, and after he's born, my family will be prosperous and most fortunate, and I'll receive excellent fortune among humans and, finally, leave home and train on the path in my teaching, end the afflictions, and realize the arhatship.'

source_sentence: 我聞是說，歡喜而歸。
translation: When I heard what they said, I rejoiced and returned.

source_sentence: 洎至家中，妹已亡歿，佛所設言，豈非虛妄？」
translation: When I arrived home, my sister had died, so were the Buddha's words not false?"

source_sentence: 是時隣人，即謂舅氏，說伽陀曰：「星月可處地，　　山石可飛空，　大海可令枯，　　佛語誠無妄。」
translation: That neighbor then told his uncle, "The stars and moon can fit on the ground, mountains and rocks can fly into the sky, and the ocean can wither, but the Buddha's words are truly not false."

source_sentence: 時彼隣人說伽陀已，復謂舅氏言：「世尊所說實無虛妄，汝妹亡歿，然有其因。
translation: After he spoke about the Gatha, that neighbor then also said to his uncle, "The Bhagavān's teaching is really not false; there's a reason your sister died and died.

source_sentence: 以善賢長者信外道言造殺害業，由殺因緣汝妹亡歿，光明童子有大威力，火不能燒蓮華中出，而今在彼頻婆娑羅王宮中養育。」
translation: Because that good man believed the words of the heretics and created harmful karma as a result of killing, your sister died, and the boy of light was so powerful that fire couldn't burn him out of the lotus flower, and he's now nurturing her in the palace of King Bimbisāra."

source_sentence: 是時隣人，具以前事，告其舅氏。
translation: The neighbor then told his uncle about the previous incident.

source_sentence: 時彼舅氏，聞此語已，即還家中，謂善賢長者言：「長者所為，不依理法，以何事故，我妹致終？
translation: After hearing this, his uncle returned home and said to the good elder, "Sir, what did you do that didn't follow the principle and the Dharma? What was the reason my sister died?

source_sentence: 然我審知我妹懷妊，汝設計謀，不全生產。
translation: Still, I've come to realize that my sister is pregnant, and you've devised a plan to prevent her from giving birth completely.

source_sentence: 汝以邪見，信受外道，起殺因緣，殺害我妹。
translation: Because of your mistaken views, you believed in the non-Buddhist religion, started the cause and condition of killing, and killed my sister.

source_sentence: 光明童子有大威力，火不能燒，蓮華中出，今在王宮，此實非理。
translation: It's really not true that the Boy of Light has great power, that fire can't burn him, and that he emerged from the lotus and is now in the palace of the king.

source_sentence: 汝可速詣王宮於今日中取童子歸，斯為甚善。
translation: Would it be good if you quickly went to the king's palace and took the boy back from there today?

source_sentence: 若不然者，我必與汝作不和合，我即當持白灰，於街巷路陌四衢道中，乃至隨處，遍散其地，普令地白，使人驚異。
translation: If you don't, I will certainly make a bad match with you, so I will take white ashes and scatter them everywhere in the four streets and roads, even everywhere, to make the ground white and astonish people.

source_sentence: 我當唱言：『善賢長者殺害女人，我妹先因此人壞命。
translation: I will shout, 'That good man killed a woman, and my sister's life was destroyed because of it.'

source_sentence: 光明童子今在王宮，王亦今時作無義利。』
translation: Now, the Boy of Light is in the king's palace, and the king is now acting uselessly.'

source_sentence: 我於隨處，必作此說，汝自籌量，無貽後恥。」
translation: I will explain this wherever I go, so you can evaluate it for yourself and not be ashamed of it."

source_sentence: 爾時，善賢長者聞此語已，心生憂惱，作是思惟：「如舅氏說，將非實邪？
translation: After hearing this, that good elder became sad and troubled, and he thought, "Would it be untrue if you had told him that?

source_sentence: 若實然者，我必懷慚。」
translation: If that's true, I'll certainly feel conscience."

source_sentence: 作是思惟已，即詣王宮。
translation: After this thought, he went to the king's palace.

source_sentence: 既至王所，跪拜伸敬，具以前事而白王言：「大王！
translation: When he arrived, he knelt down, paid homage, and said to the king about the previous events, "Great king!

source_sentence: 我尚輕小，王最勝上，若不與其童子，恐謗於王，願王今時與此童子。」
translation: I'm still young, and the king is most excellent. If I don't give him a boy, I'm afraid I'll misrepresent him to the king, so may the king give him this boy now."

source_sentence: 王言：「長者！
translation: The king said, "Sir!

source_sentence: 我本無心取此童子，是佛世尊付授於我，若非佛勅，我豈取邪？
translation: I had no intention of taking this child, but the Bhagavān gave it to me.

source_sentence: 汝若欲取此童子者，今自宜應往詣佛所，具陳斯意。」
translation: If you want to take this child, you should go to the Buddha now and explain your intentions in detail."

source_sentence: 是時，善賢長者即出王宮，往詣佛所。
translation: It was then that the elder of Good Samaritan left the palace and went to visit the Buddha.

source_sentence: 到已，白佛言：「我有親屬，從外來歸，彼謂我言：『光明童子今在王宮，於今日中，速令取歸斯為甚善。
translation: When he arrived, he said to the Buddha, "I have a relative who came from outside the country and told me, 'Now that the Boy of Light is in the palace, it would be very good if you quickly took him back today.'

source_sentence: 若不然者，彼不和合，乃至當於四衢道中，唱言：「善賢殺害女人，我妹先因此人壞命。
translation: If not, they won't be united, and they'll go down the four roads, saying, 'Good man, you killed a woman, and my sister's life was destroyed by that person.'

source_sentence: 光明童子今在王宮王亦今時作無義利。」』
translation: Now, the Boy of Light is in the king's palace, and the king is now acting uselessly."

source_sentence: 我以是事，適詣王宮，取彼童子。
translation: With this in mind, I went to the palace of the king and took the boy.

source_sentence: 王言：『先因佛令收養。』
translation: The king said, 'The Buddha first asked me to take him in.'

source_sentence: 故我來此，願佛令王還我童子。」
translation: That's why I came here, hoping that the Buddha would cause the king to return my child."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊，知是事已，觀其善賢長者，今時若不得此童子，苦惱逼心，無有是處，定當嘔血而趣命終。
translation: After he realized this, the Bhagavān observed that this good elder, if he didn't have the boy now, his mind would be beset with suffering and there would be no place for him, and he would surely vomit blood and go to the end of his life.

source_sentence: 佛大慈悲，為作救護，即告尊者阿難言：「阿難！
translation: Being greatly compassionate, the Buddha offered aid and addressed Venerable Ānanda, saying, "Ānanda!

source_sentence: 汝可往詣頻婆娑羅王宮，如我辭曰：『佛問大王得無病不？
translation: You may go to the palace of King Bimbisāra and tell him as I said, 'Does the Buddha ask the great king whether he is free of disease?'

source_sentence: 今有一事，當聽佛言：「善賢長者來取光明童子，王今宜應速當授與。
translation: Now, there's something you should hear the Buddha say, 'Good sir, you've come for the boy of light, and now it's appropriate for the king to quickly give him to you.

source_sentence: 善賢長者若不得此童子，苦惱逼心，無有是處，定當嘔血而趣命終。」』
translation: If that good man doesn't obtain the boy, his mind will be stifled by suffering, and there's no place for it; he'll surely vomit blood and go to his death."

source_sentence: 王悉是事，應如佛言。」
translation: The king understands this, and he should do as the Buddha says."

source_sentence: 是時，尊者阿難承佛聖旨，即時往詣頻婆娑羅王宮，到已見王，如佛辭曰：「佛問大王得無病不？
translation: Venerable Ānanda then, in response to the Buddha's holy command, immediately went to the palace of King Bimbisāra, and when he arrived, he met the king and said as the Buddha had said, "Does the Buddha ask the king if he's at least disease-free?

source_sentence: 今有一事，宜聽佛言。
translation: "Now, there's one thing you should listen to the Buddha's words about.

source_sentence: 善賢長者來取光明童子，善賢若不得此童子，苦惱逼心，無有是處，定當嘔血而趣命終。
translation: 'Elder Shanxian has come to fetch the boy of light; if Shanxian doesn't obtain this boy, his mind will be stifled by suffering, and there's no place for it; he'll surely vomit blood and go to the end of his life.

source_sentence: 大王應悉是事，宜速付授。」
translation: The king should know this, and it's appropriate to give it to him quickly."

source_sentence: 爾時，頻婆娑羅王受佛勅已，即作是言：「大德尊者！
translation: After receiving the Buddha's order, King Bimbisāra then said, "Venerable Mañjuśrī!

source_sentence: 迴至佛所，願傳我語：『頻婆娑羅王稽首世尊足下，致敬問訊世尊，如佛教勅，我已聽受。』」
translation: Returning to the Buddha, he asked him to convey my message, 'King Bimbisāra bowed his head at the Bhagavān's feet, paid homage, and asked the Bhagavān about this, just as the Buddha instructed, and I've accepted it.'"

source_sentence: 是時尊者阿難即出王宮，迴至佛所，具如王言，白佛世尊。
translation: Venerable Ānanda then left the palace, returned to the Buddha, and said exactly as the king had said, 'Tell the Bhagavān.'

source_sentence: 時頻婆娑羅王，即速宣召善賢長者，到已謂言：「善賢！
translation: King Bimbisāra then quickly summoned the elder Shanxian, and when he arrived, he said, "Shanxian!

source_sentence: 今此童子久在宮中，護持養育，八母看侍，乳哺依時，我心愛憐，過甚親子。
translation: Now, this boy has long been in the palace, protected and nurtured, watched over by his eight mothers, nursed and relied on at the same time, and I've loved him more than my own son.

source_sentence: 今雖佛勅還付於汝，然汝亦當體我心意，日日三時，汝自將來，我欲觀視。」
translation: Now, even though the Buddha commanded that he return it to you, you must also sympathize with my thoughts and come back to me every day and every three hours, for me to look at you."

source_sentence: 善賢長者敬受王命，即白王言：「我受王勅，敢不遵承，日日三時，將詣王所。」
translation: Respectfully accepting the king's order, the good elder said to the king, "I've received the king's order, and I dare not fail to obey it; every day and three times I'll come to the king."

source_sentence: 是時，頻婆娑羅王即以眾寶妙莊嚴具，鉸飾大象，令光明童子乘此寶象，別勅臣佐，而令伴送至長者舍。
translation: King Bimbisāra then decorated a large elephant with a collection of marvelous ornaments and had the Boy of Light ride it, sending his ministers and assistants to accompany him to the elder's quarters.

source_sentence: 而後長者，日日三時，送至王宮，王親觀視光明童子，凡所施作，皆如理法。
translation: Every day, three times a day, the elder brought it to the king's palace, where the king personally observed the Boy of Light doing everything according to the rules.

source_sentence: 乃至後時，其父善賢，趣命終已，光明童子即為家主，既嗣家業，轉復精進，信佛、信法、信苾芻眾，歸佛、歸法、歸苾芻眾。
translation: After his father, Shanxian, had reached the end of his life, the Boy of Light became the head of the household, inherited the family business, resumed his efforts, believed in the Buddha, believed in the Dharma, believed in the congregation of monks, and returned to the Buddha, the Dharma, and the congregation of monks.

source_sentence: 其父善賢長者，於此方處，先造殺業；光明長者，今為其父，修營福事，乃於自舍，常時備辦，四事豐足，承事供給四方苾芻，乃至將來結集世尊正法藏者。
translation: His father, Elder Shanxian, had first committed murder in this place, but now, on behalf of his father, Elder Guangming cultivates good works and makes constant provision in his house for the four things in abundance, making offerings to the four groups of monks, even to the point where he will gather the Bhagavān's true dharma-store in the future.

source_sentence: 上首耆年，諸大聲聞，亦常供給所須供養。
translation: The eldest elders and great śrāvakas also always make the necessary offerings.

source_sentence: 光明長者於王舍城，修如是等，種種福事，悉為其父，而作利益。
translation: In Rājagṛha, that man of light cultivates these kinds of merits for the benefit of his father.

source_sentence: 爾時，有一商客，是彼善賢長者先同商販，故舊伴侶，久在外方，商販未還，素念此人不造善業，又復聞知今已亡歿，子名光明，嗣為家主。
translation: At the time, there was a merchant who was an old companion of that good elder who had been a merchant with him and had been away for a long time before the merchant returned, and he was mindful that this man hadn't done good deeds.

source_sentence: 其光明長者信佛、信法、信苾芻眾，歸依三寶，如理所作。
translation: That bright man believed in the Buddha, believed in the Dharma, and believed in the congregation of monks, relied on the Three Treasures, and did so according to reason.

source_sentence: 時彼商客，聞是事已，傷念善賢，慶快光明長者，即以上妙牛頭旃檀之香，造一大鉢，滿盛眾寶，遠從外方，遣人持來，遺彼光明長者，以為信記。
translation: When that merchant heard this, he remembered with sadness the good man and rejoiced in that man of light. He then made a large bowl full of treasures from the incense of the wonderful ox-head sandalwood and sent someone from far away to bring it to him and leave it with that man of light as a token of faith.

source_sentence: 又令來人傳如是言：「所願長時記念不忘。」
translation: He also told the person to convey this message, "Remember what you wish for a long time and don't forget it."

source_sentence: 是時，光明長者即以呪句，而加護之，其呪所謂：「計那唧呬吒夜嚩(一句)　室吒夜嚩(二)　羯哩迦吒計那嚩(三)　仡哩係[怡-台+(日/工)]咩(四)」說此呪已，復作是言：「如是寶鉢，若沙門、若婆羅門、若大威力諸神通者，當受此鉢，如應得樂。」
translation: Thereupon, that man of light then protected him with a spell that read, "Knakhahriṭṭha (1) Śrāvastī (2) Kārikāṭhaṭha (3) Gelīyig [yi-tai+(sun/work)] baa (4)" and then said, "Thus is this precious bowl that an ascetic, a brāhmaṇa, or a person of great authority and superknowledge will accept as it should be enjoyed."

source_sentence: 如是加持已，即持此鉢，出王舍城，先於路左，立一大柱，綵繪莊飾，上復懸鈴，置鉢於下，永為標記。
translation: After thus blessing him, he took this bowl and left Rājagṛha. On the left side of the road, he erected a large pillar decorated with carvings and a bell hung from it, and he placed the bowl underneath it to mark it permanently.

source_sentence: 是時，有諸外道如彼常法，於明旦時，詣河洗浴，經由路次，見此寶鉢，即時問彼光明長者言：「長者！
translation: At the time, some non-Buddhists, as is their wont, went to the river to wash themselves at sunrise, passed by on the road, saw this jeweled bowl, and immediately asked that elder of light, "Sir!

source_sentence: 汝安此鉢，當何所用？」
translation: What will you do with this bowl?"

source_sentence: 光明長者具以元因告諸外道。
translation: The Vairocana elder told the heretics about the original cause.

source_sentence: 彼外道言：「諸有清淨沙門釋子，堪受此鉢，餘無力能而堪受者。」
translation: The heretics said, "There are pure ascetics and Śākyamunis who are capable of accepting this bowl; there's no one else who has the strength to accept it."

source_sentence: 外道言已，隨處而散。
translation: After the heretic said that, he scattered it wherever he went.

source_sentence: 乃至後有耆年大德、諸苾芻眾，入王舍城，持鉢乞食，亦於路左，見此寶鉢，即乃問彼光明長者言：「汝安此鉢，當何所用？」
translation: Even a group of elderly scholars and novices who had entered Rājagṛha and were begging for food with their bowls also saw this precious bowl on the left side of the road, and they asked that elder of light, "What will you use this bowl for?"

source_sentence: 光明長者亦以元因，廣如前答。
translation: Gṛhapati also answered in detail as before, using the original cause.

source_sentence: 諸苾芻言：「長者！
translation: The monks said, "Sir!

source_sentence: 今此寶鉢，非我等受，當持奉佛，即能增長善利，滅諸罪垢。」
translation: Now, this is a jeweled bowl that we won't accept, so we should hold it and present it to the Buddha, for it will increase good benefits and eliminate the stain of sins."

source_sentence: 時諸苾芻如是言已，隨處而散。
translation: After the monks said this, they scattered according to their location.

source_sentence: 佛說光明童子因緣經卷第二
translation: Foshuo guangming dongzi yinnian jing, vol. 2
